value: L 38 Governor Phillip Tower 1 Farrer Pl, Sydney, 2000, NSW, Australia

6221 - Commodity Contracts Brokers and Dealers Summary > MERRILL LYNCH (AUSTRALIA) FUTURES LIMITED is an Australian public company. Its operations cover commodity contracts brokers and dealers. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. MERRILL LYNCH (AUSTRALIA) FUTURES LIMITED is headquartered in Sydney, New South Wales. It is headed by director Graeme Woodcock. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $38.79 million. Its net profit totalled $18.83 million. MERRILL LYNCH (AUSTRALIA) FUTURES LIMITED forms part of the finance, insurance, and real estate industry sector. Key Personnel > No key personnel were found for the selected company.
